summary: The mod adds a new crossbow for crafting any blacksmith
descriptionHtml:
[line]

[center][color=Blue][size=4]by Monk_ide aka Leto[/size][/color][/center]


[color=Blue][size=3]Page :[/size][/color]http://forums.nexusmods.com/
index.php?showuser=678562

[line]

This mod requires the Dawnguard DLC to work.

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Blue]Description[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]The mod adds a new crossbow for crafting any blacksmith[/center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Blue]Detail[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]Necessary ingredients for forging

human skull - 1

leather strips - 2

firewood - 3

ingot steel - 3[/center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Blue]Contact[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]https://www.facebook.com/letonoots

http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?showuser=678562[/center]

[line]



[u][center][size=5][color=Blue]Manual installation[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[center]Unpack archive to Skyrimdata folder

Check plugin in Skyrim launcher

[line]



[u][size=5][color=Blue]Tools Used:[/color][/size][/center][/u]

[list]

[*][url=http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope]NifScope[/url]

[*][url=http://www.adobe.com/africa/products/photoshop.html?kw=p&sdid=JTAJR&skwcid=TC|22636|
photoshop||S|b|26174987875]Photoshop[/url]

[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859/]TES5Edit[/url]

[*][url=http://usa.autodesk.com/3ds-max/]3Ds Max[/url]

[*]Creation Kit: Downloadable on the steam network.

[*][url=http://www.7-zip.org/download.html]7Zip[/url]

[/list]

[line]
